maos/genseotf.c File Reference

contains routines to generate mean short exposure (tip/tilt removed) pixel intensities. More...

Functions

void genseotf (const PARMS_T *parms, POWFS_T *powfs, int ipowfs)
 Master routine that generates short exposure OTF by calling genotf() in the library with p/t/t removal set.

 Creating short exposure OTF caused by turbulence within LLT uplink aperture.
void gensepsf (const PARMS_T *parms, POWFS_T *powfs, int ipowfs)
 Createing subaperture short exposure PSF from the tip/tilt removed turbulence OTF and uplink OTF.
void gensei (const PARMS_T *parms, POWFS_T *powfs, int ipowfs)
 generate subaperture short exposure average pixel intensities sampled on detector from short expsoure PSF, the elongation transfer function of the sodium layer, and the detector transfer function.

Detailed Description

contains routines to generate mean short exposure (tip/tilt removed) pixel intensities.

Mostly used for LGS pixel intensity for its matched filter. Structure functions from kolmogorov spectrum is used. Not able to take into account outerscale yet.

Todo:
find ways to factor in outerscale effect (use von karman spectrum instead of kolmogorov)

Function Documentation

POWFS_T *  powfs,
int  ipowfs 
)

Master routine that generates short exposure OTF by calling genotf() in the library with p/t/t removal set. 

00044                                                                {
00045     //create a grid representing the aperture.
00046     LOC_T *loc=mksqloc(powfs[ipowfs].pts->nx,
00047                powfs[ipowfs].pts->nx,
00048                powfs[ipowfs].pts->dx,
00049                0,0);
00050     //size of the OTF grid
00051     int ncompx=powfs[ipowfs].pts->nx*parms->powfs[ipowfs].embfac;
00052     int ncompy=ncompx;
00053     //The embeding factor for embedding the aperture
00054     const int embfac=parms->powfs[ipowfs].embfac;
00055     const double dxsa=powfs[ipowfs].pts->dsa;
00056     const int nwvl=parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwvl;
00057     int nsa=powfs[ipowfs].pts->nsa;
00058  
00059     int notf=1;
00060     int has_ncpa=0;
00061     if(parms->powfs[ipowfs].ncpa && parms->powfs[ipowfs].ncpa_method==2){
00062     has_ncpa=1;
00063     notf=parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwfs;
00064     }
00065     powfs[ipowfs].intstat->notf=notf;
00066     powfs[ipowfs].intstat->otf=calloc(notf, sizeof(ccell*));
00067     for(int iotf=0; iotf<notf; iotf++){
00068     powfs[ipowfs].intstat->otf[iotf]=ccellnew(nsa,nwvl);
00069     }
00070  
00071     for(int iwvl=0; iwvl<nwvl; iwvl++){
00072     double wvl=parms->powfs[ipowfs].wvl[iwvl];
00073     double dtheta=wvl/(dxsa*embfac);
00074     if(has_ncpa){
00075         info2("There is NCPA bias for powfs %d\n", ipowfs);
00076         for(int iwfs=0; iwfs<parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwfs; iwfs++){
00077         info("Generating otf for wfs %d of this powfs\n",iwfs);
00078         double *opdbias=powfs[ipowfs].ncpa->p[iwfs]->p;
00079         double thres=1;
00080         genotf(powfs[ipowfs].intstat->otf[iwfs]->p+iwvl*nsa,
00081                loc, powfs[ipowfs].amp, opdbias, powfs[ipowfs].pts->area, 
00082                thres,wvl,dtheta,parms->atm.r0, parms->atm.l0, 
00083                ncompx, ncompy, nsa,1,parms->sim.nthread);
00084         }//iwfs
00085     }else{
00086         info2("There is no NCPA bias for powfs %d\n", ipowfs);
00087         double thres=1-1e-10;
00088         double *opdbias=NULL;
00089         genotf(powfs[ipowfs].intstat->otf[0]->p+iwvl*nsa,
00090            loc, powfs[ipowfs].amp, opdbias, powfs[ipowfs].pts->area, 
00091            thres,wvl,dtheta,parms->atm.r0, parms->atm.l0, 
00092            ncompx, ncompy, nsa, 1, parms->sim.nthread);
00093     }
00094     }//iwvl
00095     locfree(loc);
00096 }

POWFS_T *  powfs,
int  ipowfs 
)

Creating short exposure OTF caused by turbulence within LLT uplink aperture. 

00100                                                               {
00101     if(!parms->powfs[ipowfs].llt) return;
00102     LOC_T *loc=mksqloc(powfs[ipowfs].lotf->pts->nx,
00103                powfs[ipowfs].lotf->pts->nx,
00104                powfs[ipowfs].lotf->pts->dx,
00105                0,0);
00106     
00107     int ncompx=powfs[ipowfs].lotf->pts->nx*parms->powfs[ipowfs].embfac;
00108     int ncompy=ncompx;
00109     const int nwvl=parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwvl;
00110     cmat **lotf=NULL;
00111     powfs[ipowfs].intstat->lotf=ccellnew(nwvl,1);
00112     lotf=powfs[ipowfs].intstat->lotf->p;
00113     if(nwvl!=1){
00114     warning("LGS has multi-color!\n");
00115     }
00116     for(int iwvl=0; iwvl<nwvl; iwvl++){
00117     double wvl=parms->powfs[ipowfs].wvl[iwvl];
00118     double dtheta=powfs[ipowfs].dtheta->p[iwvl];
00119     double thres=1;
00120     genotf(&lotf[iwvl], loc, powfs[ipowfs].lotf->amp, NULL, powfs[ipowfs].pts->area,
00121            thres, wvl, dtheta, parms->atm.r0, parms->atm.l0, ncompx, ncompy, 1, 1, 1);
00122 
00123 #if DEBUG_POWFSINTS == 1
00124     ddraw("genselotf",lotf[iwvl], "lltotf");
00125 #endif
00126 
00127     }//iwvl
00128     locfree(loc);
00129 }

void gensepsf ( const PARMS_T *  parms,
POWFS_T *  powfs,
int  ipowfs 
)

Createing subaperture short exposure PSF from the tip/tilt removed turbulence OTF and uplink OTF.

Not including detector or elongation characteristics. 

00133                                                                {
00134     const int nwvl=parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwvl;
00135     int nsa=powfs[ipowfs].pts->nsa;
00136     int nllt;
00137     if(parms->powfs[ipowfs].hasllt)
00138     nllt=parms->powfs[ipowfs].llt->n;
00139     else
00140     nllt=0;
00141     cmat **lotf=NULL;
00142     if(nllt>0){
00143     lotf=powfs[ipowfs].intstat->lotf->p;
00144     }
00145     powfs[ipowfs].intstat->nsepsf=powfs[ipowfs].intstat->notf;
00146     powfs[ipowfs].intstat->sepsf=calloc(powfs[ipowfs].intstat->nsepsf, sizeof(dcell*));
00147     for(int isepsf=0; isepsf<powfs[ipowfs].intstat->nsepsf; isepsf++){
00148     int iotf=isepsf;
00149     PCCELL(powfs[ipowfs].intstat->otf[iotf],otf);
00150     powfs[ipowfs].intstat->sepsf[isepsf]=dcellnew(nsa,nwvl);
00151     dmat *(*psepsf)[nsa]=(void*)powfs[ipowfs].intstat->sepsf[isepsf]->p;
00152     const double *area=powfs[ipowfs].pts->area;
00153     for(int iwvl=0; iwvl<nwvl; iwvl++){
00154         const int notfx=otf[iwvl][0]->nx;
00155         const int notfy=otf[iwvl][0]->ny;
00156         cmat *sepsf=cnew(notfx,notfy);
00157         cfft2plan(sepsf,1);
00158         
00159         for(int isa=0; isa<nsa; isa++){
00160         double norm=area[isa]/((double)(notfx*notfy));
00161         ccp(&sepsf,otf[iwvl][isa]);
00162         if(nllt>0){//has laser launch
00163             ccwm(sepsf,lotf[iwvl]);
00164         }
00165         cfftshift(sepsf); //peak now in corner.
00166         cfft2(sepsf,1);   //turn to psf. FFT 1th
00167         cfftshift(sepsf); //psf with peak in center
00168         creal2d(&psepsf[iwvl][isa],0,sepsf,norm);//copy to output.
00169         }
00170         cfree(sepsf);
00171     }
00172     }
00173 }

void gensei ( const PARMS_T *  parms,
POWFS_T *  powfs,
int  ipowfs 
)

generate subaperture short exposure average pixel intensities sampled on detector from short expsoure PSF, the elongation transfer function of the sodium layer, and the detector transfer function. 

00178                                                              {
00179 #if ROT_OTF == 1
00180     info("Rotating OTF for Polar CCD\n");//Used mainly for off-axis launch
00181 #elif ROT_OTF==0
00182     info("Rotating PSF for Polar CCD\n");//Used mainly for on-axis launch
00183 #else
00184     error("Invalid ROT_OTF\n");
00185 #endif
00186     const int ncompx=powfs[ipowfs].ncompx;
00187     const int ncompy=powfs[ipowfs].ncompy;
00188     const int nwvl=parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwvl;
00189     int nsa=powfs[ipowfs].pts->nsa;
00190     int nllt;
00191     if(parms->powfs[ipowfs].llt){
00192     nllt=parms->powfs[ipowfs].llt->n;
00193     }else{
00194     nllt=0;
00195     }
00196     /**
00197        ni0 may be greater than 1 in the following two cases
00198        1) multiple LLT
00199        2) different signal level or wvlwts
00200        3) powfs[ipowfs].bkgrnd contains rayleigh scatter bkgrnd for each wfs in this powfs.
00201      */
00202     int ni0;
00203     if(nllt<=1){ 
00204     ni0=powfs[ipowfs].intstat->nsepsf;
00205     }else{
00206     ni0=nllt;
00207     }
00208     if(ni0==1 && parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwfs>1){//check wvlwts.
00209     int iwfs0=parms->powfs[ipowfs].wfs[0];
00210     double siglev0=parms->wfs[iwfs0].siglev;
00211     double *wvlwts0=parms->wfs[iwfs0].wvlwts;
00212     for(int jwfs=1; jwfs<parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwfs;jwfs++){
00213         int iwfs=parms->powfs[ipowfs].wfs[jwfs];
00214         double siglev=parms->wfs[iwfs].siglev;
00215         double *wvlwts=parms->wfs[iwfs].wvlwts;
00216         if(fabs(siglev-siglev0)>EPS){
00217         ni0=parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwfs;
00218         warning("Different wfs for powfs %d has different siglev\n",ipowfs);
00219         goto done;
00220         }
00221         for(int iwvl=0; iwvl<parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwvl; iwvl++){
00222         if(fabs(wvlwts[iwvl]-wvlwts0[iwvl])>EPS){
00223             ni0=parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwfs;
00224             warning("Different wfs for powfs %d "
00225                 "has different wvlwts\n",ipowfs);
00226             goto done;
00227         }
00228         }
00229     }
00230     done:
00231     if(ni0!=1){
00232         warning("Different wfs have different i0\n");
00233     }
00234     }
00235     if(powfs[ipowfs].bkgrnd && powfs[ipowfs].bkgrnd->ny>1){
00236     if(powfs[ipowfs].bkgrnd->ny != parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwfs){
00237         error("powfs[%d].bkgrndfn must contain 1 or %d columns in this powfs\n",
00238           ipowfs, parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwfs);
00239         
00240     }
00241     ni0=parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwfs;
00242     }
00243     info("powfs %d: number of i0 for matched filter is %d\n",ipowfs,ni0);
00244     if(ni0!=1 && ni0!=parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwfs){
00245     error("Number of i0 must be either 1 or %d, but is %d\n",
00246           parms->powfs[ipowfs].nwfs,ni0);
00247     }
00248     powfs[ipowfs].intstat->i0=dcellnew(nsa,ni0);
00249     powfs[ipowfs].intstat->gx=dcellnew(nsa,ni0);
00250     powfs[ipowfs].intstat->gy=dcellnew(nsa,ni0);
00251     //subaperture rotation angle.
00252     dmat* (*i0)[nsa]=(dmat*(*)[nsa])powfs[ipowfs].intstat->i0->p;
00253     dmat* (*gx)[nsa]=(dmat*(*)[nsa])powfs[ipowfs].intstat->gx->p;
00254     dmat* (*gy)[nsa]=(dmat*(*)[nsa])powfs[ipowfs].intstat->gy->p;
00255     /*
00256       Notice, the generation of shifted i0s are not accurate
00257       because the PSF is not enough to cover the size.
00258       Disable the computation.
00259     */
00260     const int pixpsax=powfs[ipowfs].pixpsax;
00261     const int pixpsay=powfs[ipowfs].pixpsay;
00262     const double *area=powfs[ipowfs].pts->area;
00263   
00264     for(int ii0=0; ii0<ni0; ii0++){
00265     for(int isa=0; isa<nsa; isa++){
00266         i0[ii0][isa]=dnew(pixpsax,pixpsay);
00267         gx[ii0][isa]=dnew(pixpsax,pixpsay);
00268         gy[ii0][isa]=dnew(pixpsax,pixpsay);
00269     }
00270     }
00271   
00272     const int i0scale=parms->powfs[ipowfs].i0scale;
00273     if(i0scale){
00274     warning("i0 is scaled to match sa area\n");
00275     }
00276 #if SAVE_OTF==1
00277     ccell *saveotf=ccellnew(nsa,nwvl);
00278     cmat *(*psaveotf)[nsa]=(void*)saveotf->p;
00279     ccell *saveotfetf=ccellnew(nsa,nwvl);
00280     cmat *(*psaveotfetf)[nsa]=(void*)saveotfetf->p;
00281     ccell *savepsf=ccellnew(nsa,nwvl);
00282     cmat *(*psavepsf)[nsa]=(void*)savepsf->p;
00283 #endif
00284     int isepsf_multiplier
00285     =powfs[ipowfs].intstat->nsepsf>1?1:0;
00286     int irot_multiplier=nllt>1?1:0;
00287     for(int iwvl=0; iwvl<nwvl; iwvl++){
00288     int idtf_multiplier
00289         =powfs[ipowfs].dtf[iwvl].si->ny>1?1:0;
00290     int idtfisa_multiplier
00291         =powfs[ipowfs].dtf[iwvl].si->nx>1?1:0;
00292     cmat *seotfj=cnew(ncompx,ncompy);
00293     cmat *seotfk=cnew(ncompx,ncompy);
00294     cfft2plan(seotfk,-1);
00295     cfft2plan(seotfk,1);
00296     cfft2plan(seotfj,1);
00297     dcomplex *Ux=powfs[ipowfs].dtf[iwvl].Ux->p;
00298     dcomplex *Uy=powfs[ipowfs].dtf[iwvl].Uy->p;
00299     
00300     double norm=1./(double)(ncompx*ncompy);
00301     const int npsf=powfs[ipowfs].intstat->sepsf[0]->p[0]->nx;
00302 #if ROT_OTF == 1
00303     double xscale=(double)npsf/(double)ncompx;
00304     double yscale=(double)npsf/(double)ncompy;
00305 #endif
00306     cmat *sepsf=cnew(npsf,npsf);
00307     cfft2plan(sepsf,-1);
00308 
00309     const cmat *(*petf)[nsa]=NULL;
00310     void (*pccwm)(cmat*,const cmat*)=NULL;
00311     int rotpsf=0;
00312     int ietf_multiplier=0;
00313     if(nllt){
00314         if(powfs[ipowfs].etfprep[iwvl].p1){
00315         petf=(void*)powfs[ipowfs].etfprep[iwvl].p1->p;
00316         pccwm=ccwmcol;
00317         rotpsf=1;
00318         if(powfs[ipowfs].etfprep[iwvl].p1->ny==1)
00319             ietf_multiplier=0;
00320         else
00321             ietf_multiplier=1;
00322         }else{
00323         petf=(void*)powfs[ipowfs].etfprep[iwvl].p2->p;
00324         pccwm=ccwm;
00325         rotpsf=0;
00326         if(powfs[ipowfs].etfprep[iwvl].p2->ny==1)
00327             ietf_multiplier=0;
00328         else
00329             ietf_multiplier=1;
00330         }
00331     }
00332     cmat *nominal=NULL;
00333     dsp *si=NULL;
00334 
00335     double angle=0;//angle to rotate otf/psf
00336     double angleg=0;//angle to derivative of i0 to r/a from x/y
00337     double anglegoff=0;
00338     for(int ii0=0; ii0<ni0; ii0++){
00339         int isepsf=ii0*isepsf_multiplier;
00340         int idtf=ii0*idtf_multiplier;
00341         int irot=ii0*irot_multiplier;
00342         int ietf=ii0*ietf_multiplier;
00343         int iwfs=parms->powfs[ipowfs].wfs[ii0];
00344         double wvlsig=parms->wfs[iwfs].wvlwts[iwvl]
00345         *parms->wfs[iwfs].siglev*parms->powfs[ipowfs].dtrat;
00346         info("powfs %d: iwvl=%d, iwfs=%d, wvlsig=%g\n",ipowfs,iwvl,iwfs,wvlsig);
00347         dmat *(*psepsf)[nsa]=(void*)powfs[ipowfs].intstat->sepsf[isepsf]->p;
00348         double pgrad[2];
00349         cmat **nominals=NULL;
00350         if(!powfs[ipowfs].dtf[iwvl].fused){//may be null if fused to etf
00351         nominals=powfs[ipowfs].dtf[iwvl].nominal->p+nsa*idtf;
00352         }
00353         dsp **sis=powfs[ipowfs].dtf[iwvl].si->p+nsa*idtf;
00354         const double *angles=NULL;
00355         if(nllt)
00356         angles=powfs[ipowfs].srot->p[irot]->p;
00357         for(int isa=0; isa<nsa; isa++){
00358         int isadtf=isa*idtfisa_multiplier;
00359         if(nominals)
00360             nominal=nominals[isadtf];
00361         si=sis[isadtf];
00362         if(nllt && parms->powfs[ipowfs].radpix){
00363             //Polar CCD.
00364             if(rotpsf){//OTF is along R/A direction. angleg is 0.
00365             angle=angles[isa];
00366             }else{
00367             angleg=angles[isa];
00368             }
00369         }
00370     
00371         //loaded psepsf. sum to 1 for full sa. peak in center
00372         if(parms->powfs[ipowfs].mtchstc){
00373             //Forst psf to be centered.
00374             double pmax=dmax(psepsf[iwvl][isa]);
00375             dcog(pgrad,psepsf[iwvl][isa],0.5,0.5,0.1*pmax,0.2*pmax);
00376         }
00377         ccpd(&sepsf,psepsf[iwvl][isa]);
00378 #if ROT_OTF == 1//ROTATE OTF
00379         cfftshift(sepsf);//peak in corner
00380         cfft2(sepsf,-1);//turn to OTF;//max at 1.
00381         cfftshift(sepsf);//peak in center
00382         cembedscaleout(seotfk,sepsf,xscale,yscale,-angle,C_FULL);
00383         cfftshift(seotfk); //otf, peak in corner
00384 #endif
00385 
00386 #if ROT_OTF==0//rotate PSF
00387         cembed(seotfk,sepsf,-angle,C_ABS);//ABS to avoid small negative
00388 #if SAVE_OTF == 1
00389         ccp(&psavepsf[iwvl][isa],seotfk);
00390 #endif
00391         cfftshift(seotfk);//PSF, peak in corner;
00392         cfft2(seotfk,-1);//turn to OTF peak in corner
00393         if(parms->powfs[ipowfs].mtchstc && fabs(pgrad[0])>EPS && fabs(pgrad[1])>EPS){
00394             //info("grad in psf is %g %g\n",pgrad[0],pgrad[1]);
00395             ctilt(seotfk,-pgrad[0],-pgrad[1],0);
00396         }
00397 #endif
00398 #if SAVE_OTF ==1
00399         ccp(&psaveotf[iwvl][isa],seotfk);
00400 #endif
00401         if(nllt){//elongation.
00402             (*pccwm)(seotfk,petf[ietf][isa]);
00403         }
00404         //seotfk has peak in corner
00405 #if SAVE_OTF ==1
00406         ccp(&psaveotfetf[iwvl][isa],seotfk);
00407 #endif
00408         ccwm2(seotfk,nominal,norm);//NULL is handled correctly.
00409         ccp(&seotfj,seotfk);//backup
00410         cfft2(seotfk,1);//peak in center.
00411         //no need fftshift becaose nominal is pre-treated
00412         spmulcreal(i0[ii0][isa]->p,si,seotfk->p, wvlsig);
00413         ccp(&seotfk,seotfj);
00414         dcomplex(*X)[ncompx]
00415             =(dcomplex(*)[ncompx])(seotfk->p);
00416         dcomplex(*Y)[ncompx]
00417             =(dcomplex(*)[ncompx])(seotfj->p);
00418         
00419         double ct=cos(angleg+anglegoff);
00420         double st=sin(angleg+anglegoff);
00421         
00422         for(int iy=0; iy<ncompy; iy++){
00423             for(int ix=0; ix<ncompx; ix++){
00424             X[iy][ix]*=ct*Ux[ix]+st*Uy[iy];
00425             Y[iy][ix]*=-st*Ux[ix]+ct*Uy[iy];
00426             }
00427         }
00428         cfft2(seotfk,1);
00429         spmulcreal(gx[ii0][isa]->p,si,seotfk->p, wvlsig);
00430         cfft2(seotfj,1);
00431         spmulcreal(gy[ii0][isa]->p,si,seotfj->p, wvlsig);
00432         if(i0scale){
00433             double scale=area[isa]/dsum(i0[ii0][isa]);
00434             dscale(i0[ii0][isa],scale);
00435             dscale(gx[ii0][isa],scale);
00436             dscale(gy[ii0][isa],scale);
00437         }
00438         }//for illt
00439     }//isa
00440     cfree(sepsf);
00441     cfree(seotfj);
00442     cfree(seotfk);
00443     }//iwvl
00444 #if SAVE_OTF==1
00445     ccellwrite(saveotf,"powfs%d_saveotf.bin.gz",ipowfs);
00446     ccellwrite(savepsf,"powfs%d_savepsf.bin.gz",ipowfs);
00447     ccellwrite(saveotfetf,"powfs%d_saveotfetf.bin.gz",ipowfs);
00448 #endif
00449 }
